document_data.name: Brossfeather
document_data.symbol: A silver-bladed axe and a red feather over a field of gold
document_data.mainbody: '''Brossfeather''' ({{Pronounce|BROSS|feth|er|refs=}}) was a [[Nobility of Waterdeep|noble]] [[Waterdhavian]] house that had a long history of wealth and prosperity for over a hundred years as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web enhancement/Noble Houses of Waterdeep|2}}
document_data.Activities: Their holdings were in forestry and lumber businesses.
document_data.Base of Operations: The family had a villa in the [[North Ward of Waterdeep|North Ward]] of the city, located between [[Brassfeather Lane]] and [[Anteos Lane]]. It was aptly named [[Brossfeather Towers]], with an architecture that was similar to the [[Stagsmere]] rental villa.
document_data.Members:
* [[Orbul Brossfeather]]: Patariarch and head of the family
* [[Katya Brossfeather]]: Lady of the house
* [[Pol Brossfeather]]
* [[Rhys Brossfeather]]
